answers.answer: Yes was admitted Monday for it was to b induced tonight but went into labor this morning.

Did you have symptoms of pre eclampsia? If so,  what did you have? Sorry to pry but I'm going to Dr first thing in morning due to BAD spotty vision and swelling and headaches :/ kinda worried! Hope your stay goes by fast for you!

I'm 33wks and currently at home on bedrest but have done 5 hospital admissions this pregnancy already so can sympathise with you. This is my 2nd pregnancy with preeclamplsia. Just hoping to make it to my csection in 18 days!

I didn't have any symptoms except swelling. My bp is pretty stable with meds. Nothing else except protein in urine. Im 31 & 4 days. I'll have to stay until at least 34 wks maybe longer of Baby stays well at that point

question: Are there any of you in the hospital on bedrest? I've been here two wks and losing my mind. Still have about 3 wks to go.
title: preeclampsia moms
